I been using Snagit for a while now.  This is More than just simple screen capture. 

Snagit is faster with one click copy. You can capture, edit, share and organize a screenshot. 

Snagit can combine pictures, words, and other objects into a A picture designed, which SHift + option+3 and SHift + option+4 can not do...
